9ef21308-f810-46e9-9d7a-fd7eec9b34f7.name: Heroic Archer
9ef21308-f810-46e9-9d7a-fd7eec9b34f7.notes: Reduce arrow ready time by one round with roll/penalty and Acc bonus without aiming or ignore bulk

97e5ce27-12af-45b1-926b-103c728c7bbf.name: 战斗反射
97e5ce27-12af-45b1-926b-103c728c7bbf.notes: Never freeze; +6 on all IQ rolls to wake up or to recover from surprise or mental stun; Your side gets +1 to initiative rolls (+2 if you're the leader)

65f44534-4941-4e02-9c33-0bf964723143.name: 健康
65f44534-4941-4e02-9c33-0bf964723143.notes: +1 to all HT rolls to stay conscious, avoid death, resist disease, resist poison; recover FP at twice the normal rate (but not FP spent for spells or psi powers)

9c424d32-7fdd-4300-90d8-2c1bdcef50c3.name: Fit, Very
9c424d32-7fdd-4300-90d8-2c1bdcef50c3.notes: +2 to all HT rolls to stay conscious, avoid death, resist disease, resist poison; recover FP at twice the normal rate; lose FP at half the normal rate (in both cases, not FP spent for spells or psi powers)

0a1bc2cd-8129-46e9-b89a-2b64108530c7.name: 高痛阈
0a1bc2cd-8129-46e9-b89a-2b64108530c7.notes: Never suffer shock penalties when injured; +3 on all HT rolls to avoid knockdown and stunning; +3 to resist torture

8cf72a61-1629-45d0-9809-f78a5c8add16.name: 幸运
8cf72a61-1629-45d0-9809-f78a5c8add16.notes: 游戏的每个小时可用一次

dc829b20-7030-4380-868e-f1d1eb61f27c.name: 易于命中
dc829b20-7030-4380-868e-f1d1eb61f27c.notes: 其他人可以将你的双眼作为攻击目标仅受到 -6 命中减值

05447c5c-c472-4402-a014-b7254841653d.name: 标志性装备
05447c5c-c472-4402-a014-b7254841653d.notes: Gear is worth (starting wealth)/10 per level

64b14905-7abd-4f50-a794-73d4c5dc2aac.name: Weapon Bond
64b14905-7abd-4f50-a794-73d4c5dc2aac.notes: You own a Weapon that is uniquely suited to you.

81cf27a5-e56b-48d2-8dba-ac549ad12326.name: 两种通常会在一起使用的武器

a657a631-b1a2-475b-9aee-efa70c9e1ec0.name: 范围：任何与你不同的人

723f24c5-c604-4b92-a694-e2a451a12fdf.name: 社会污名（逐出家族，非继承人）

f392b4e3-e8af-4242-a1f0-f0710fb19736.name: Vow (Own no more than what can be carried)

57409d0d-49b7-474f-b22b-29fee351c523.name: 18 points in Ranged or General Imbuement Skills for the Bow.

77f4110f-8b3d-40b1-944b-f09bd27b9d12.name: 8 points in improving primary or secondary skills, or:
